title: Income Tax Guideline and Rates in Ethiopia
content: In Ethiopia, income tax is paid monthly or annually based on your income level. In Ethiopia, income tax rates vary based on income level. For example, a monthly income above 25,000 Birr may be taxed at 35%. To calculate net salary, subtract the tax from the gross salary: Net Salary = Gross Salary - (Gross Salary Ã— Tax Rate). For more details, visit the Ethiopian Revenue and Customs Authority website.
